title: Moloko Plus magazine cover logo
content:
I guess it’s custom (those nice ligatures...). If so, do you know any similar fonts? Here’s the [link](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423213141/http:/www.molokoplus-mag.com/eng/).

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423213141im_/http:/typophile.com/files/cover_molokoplus-issue5_4736.jpg)

Thanks in advance.

 [‹ (x) PR sign on pedestrian route - Arial {Lex}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423213141/http:/typophile.com/node/44429 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Egg Harbor" town population sign - Highway Gothic (Interstate) {Jan E} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423213141/http:/typophile.com/node/44428 "Go to next forum topic")
author: dedaluz

comments.content: [Expletive Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423213141/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/virus_fonts/expletive_script_regular/) is the first that comes to mind. Then [FIG Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423213141/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/process/fig_script_ot/).
